schemes.name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
schemes.benefits: ₹6,000 per year in 3 installments of ₹2,000 each
schemes.applicationProcess: Visit nearest Common Service Center or apply online at pmkisan.gov.in

schemes.name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
schemes.nameHindi: महात्मा गांधी राष्ट्रीय ग्रामीण रोजगार गारंटी अधिनियम
schemes.benefits: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment per year
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at local Gram Panchayat office or online at nrega.nic.in

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
schemes.nameHindi: आयुष्मान भारत - प्रधानमंत्री जन आरोग्य योजना
schemes.benefits: Free health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year
schemes.applicationProcess: Visit nearest Ayushman Mitra or hospital, or check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance of ₹1.20 lakh for plain areas and ₹1.30 lakh for hilly areas
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Gram Panchayat or online at pmayg.nic.in

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.benefits: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for first refill and stove
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at nearest LPG distributor or online at pmuy.gov.in

schemes.name: National Social Assistance Programme
schemes.benefits: Monthly pension of ₹200-500 for elderly, widows, and disabled persons
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at local Panchayat or District Social Welfare Office

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Crop insurance against natural calamities, pests, and diseases
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through bank, CSC, or online at pmfby.gov.in

schemes.name: e-Shram Card
schemes.benefits: Registration for unorganized workers, access to social security schemes
schemes.applicationProcess: Register online at eshram.gov.in or through CSC

schemes.name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
schemes.nameHindi: दीन दयाल उपाध्याय ग्रामीण कौशल्य योजना
schemes.benefits: Free skill training and placement assistance for rural youth
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Project Implementing Agencies or online at ddugky.gov.in

schemes.name: National Rural Livelihood Mission
schemes.benefits: Self-help group formation, skill training, and financial assistance for women
schemes.applicationProcess: Contact local Self Help Group or apply through Block office

schemes.name: PM Dhan-Dhaanya Krishi Yojana
schemes.benefits: Financial support for 100 agri-districts to improve pulse and oilseed productivity.
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Block Agriculture Office or PM-DDKY portal.

schemes.name: PM Krishi Sinchayee Yojana
schemes.benefits: Subsidies on drip and sprinkler irrigation systems (Per Drop More Crop).
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply via state agriculture department website.

schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
schemes.benefits: Financial aid for organic farming and cluster development (₹50,000 per hectare).
schemes.applicationProcess: Register through local agriculture office.

schemes.name: PM RAHAT Scheme
schemes.benefits: Cashless treatment up to ₹1.5 lakh for road accident victims within the 'Golden Hour'.
documents: Not required for emergency, Aadhaar for claim discharge
schemes.applicationProcess: Automatic eligibility at any empanelled hospital during emergency.

schemes.name: PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Life insurance cover of ₹2 lakh on death due to any reason.
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through your bank branch.

schemes.name: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Accidental death/disability cover of ₹2 lakh at a premium of ₹20/year.
schemes.applicationProcess: Enroll via SMS or Net Banking or at the bank branch.

schemes.name: Lakhpati Didi Initiative
schemes.benefits: Interest-free loans and skill training to help SHG women earn ₹1 lakh+ per year.
schemes.applicationProcess: Contact local Self-Help Group or Block Mission Management Unit.

schemes.name: Namo Drone Didi Scheme
schemes.benefits: Training and provision of drones to women SHGs for agricultural services.
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through NRLM block offices.

schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.benefits: High-interest savings scheme for girl child education and marriage.
schemes.applicationProcess: Open account at any Post Office or commercial bank.

schemes.name: PM MUDRA Yojana
schemes.benefits: Loans up to ₹20 lakh for non-farm small/micro enterprises (Limit increased in 2025).
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply online at udyamimitra.in or visit any bank.

schemes.name: PM Vishwakarma
schemes.benefits: Toolkit incentive of ₹15,000, collateral-free loans, and skill training for artisans.
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through CSC (Common Service Center).

schemes.name: PM Janjatiya Unnat Gram Abhiyan
schemes.benefits: Saturation coverage of infrastructure and services in 63,000 tribal-majority villages.
schemes.applicationProcess: Direct implementation through tribal welfare department and Gram Sabha.
